projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, product management, and payment integration.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
projects.challenges: The main challenge was implementing a scalable cart system that could handle concurrent users and maintain data consistency. This was solved by implementing a Redis-based cart system with optimistic locking.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.
projects.challenges: Implementing real-time updates while maintaining performance was challenging. This was solved by implementing efficient data structures and using Firebase's real-time database with proper indexing.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern portfolio website showcasing projects and skills with smooth animations and responsive design.
projects.challenges: Creating smooth animations while maintaining performance was the main challenge. This was solved by using Framer Motion's optimized animation system and implementing proper code splitting.
